mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (order_id, cust_id, total_item_qty, total_price, total_dc_amt, order_amt, ship_fee, ship_loca_id, ship_no) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{custId}, #{totalItemQty}, #{totalPrice}, #{totalDcAmt}, #{orderAmt}, #{shipFee}, #{shipLocaId}, #{shipNo})
INSERT INTO order_item_list (order_id, item_id, item_qty, item_price, item_dc_price) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{itemId}, #{itemQty}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemDcPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, i.name item_name FROM order_item_list o INNER JOIN item i ON o.item_id = i.item_id WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
